channel.title: How do I change what people log in with on their characters?
channel.description: when people log in for the first time on my server they are wearing a crappy out fit. I really need to know how to change this. please let me know what file I need to go into and edit. thanks..

item.title: How do I change what people log in with on their characters?
item.dc:creator: @grayfoxx grayfoxx
item.description:
@grayfoxx wrote:

rofl… but… how do I fix my original problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2009, 03:07:11 pm[/size][hr]nvm… i figured it out! =]=]=]=]

item.title: How do I change what people log in with on their characters?
item.dc:creator: @RarerThanRares RarerThanRares
item.description:
@RarerThanRares wrote:

Its in player.java
Search for Initial
Under that you should find what they are wearing change it to whatever
-1 is for nothing
